Name: Bajan Passion
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop flesh into shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: A Daiquiri laced with generous fruit and a touch of vanilla.
History: Created in 2004 by Wayne Collins , London, England.
